title: Rolling - energies at top and bottom of ramp

content.question: Which of the following is true of the sphere when it reaches the bottom of the ramp?

choices.label: The sphere’s rotational kinetic energy equals the initial potential energy of the sphere-Earth system.
The sphere’s translational kinetic energy equals the initial potential energy of the sphere-Earth system.
The sphere’s translational kinetic energy and rotational kinetic energy are equal.
The sum of the sphere’s translational kinetic energy and rotational kinetic energy equals the initial potential energy of the sphere-Earth system.

content.answer: The sum of the sphere’s translational kinetic energy and rotational kinetic energy equals the initial potential energy of the sphere-Earth system.

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
